column1: #Text=I 've spent too long trying to find this place .
#Text=There 's not another collection of knowledge like this on earth .
#Text=I could spend an eternity in here .
#Text=" Main Aang Appa Katara Momo Sokka Toph Zei Antagonists Ghashiun Si Wong tribes Wan Shi Tong says : " Minor Knowledge Seekers Zhao ( flashback only ) "
